name: UMeshInspectorMaterialProperties
doc: material settings for mesh inspector tool

MaterialMode: Material that will be used to render the mesh
CheckerDensity: Number of checkerboard tiles within the 0 to 1 range; only available when Checkerboard is selected as material mode
OverrideMaterial: Material to use instead of the original material; only available when Override is selected as material mode
UVChannel: Which UV channel to use for visualizing the checkerboard material on the mesh; note that this does not affect the preview layout
bTwoSided: Although a two-sided transparent material causes rendering issues with overlapping faces, it is still frequently useful to see the shape when sculpting around other objects.
